name: Hight Car Driving Mountain
description:
Hight Car Driving Mountainr is created for real offroad car driving lovers. Game includes all essential components to get maximum enjoy from car driving: almost all possible environments for offroad driving including sand, snow, grass, rocks, ice, gravels. Real SUV cars with different engines, speed, controls and brake parameters with great sound effects, animations, true physics and professional car control system.
Test this great cars in free mode to check each car's performance, strengths, weaknesses. Or just drive them to enjoy offroading simulation.
